name: Greedy Slime (tiobagas)
description:
Gooey is a money-grubber slime . He was exiled from his pack because of his greediness. But he is not heartbroken for he wants to explore the whole world and find all the Gold Coins out there. As peaceful as it is, the outside world is filled with monster with appearance like gear, The Grinder.   Help Gooey in his adventure in search of all the Gold Coins and avoid The Grinder.

Features :

Gooey just has one live so make sure that he doesn't get killed by The Grinder or fall in to the Abyss. There is two levels in this version, the Grassland and the Desert. Each level has a finish flag which is invisible. The finish flag become visible once player collect ten Gold Coins in the level. The first level once cleared teleport the player to the next level that is the Desert. Once the Desert get cleared, then the winning display will appear. Make sure you don't get lost in the level and remember the place of the rectangle signboard for it is the place that the finish flag will appear.

Control :

Arrow Left : Move left

Arrow Right : Move right

Arrow Up : Jump
